required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Incidence and Factors Associated With Double-J Urinary Stent Infection (IJJ)
clinical_study.official_title: Incidence and Factors Associated With Double-J Urinary Stent Infection (IJJ)

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study was to determine the incidence and factors associated with double-J urinary stent infection.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with urinary tract infection associated with double J stent
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with urinary tract infection associated with double J stent

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with specific clinical data associated with urinary tract infection associated with double J stent
primary_outcome.description: Clinical data (Age, sex, gender, comorbidities, indication of procedure, duration of double J stent placement) will be compared between patient with urinary tract infection and no urinary tract infection associated with double J stent

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with relapse and/or recurrence after a first urinary tract infection
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with relapse and/or recurrence after a first urinary tract infection

arm_group.description: Patients diagnosed with urinary tract infection associated with double J stent
Patients with double J stent without infection during the study period

study_pop.textblock:
All patients with a double-J stent placement or change in the hospital will be included.
Follow-up will be repeated at 1, 3 and 6 months and urinary tract infection will be reported

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with a double-J stent placement or change in the hospital
Exclusion Criteria:
- renal transplants less than one year old
